author: Yong Pung How CJ:
casename: Pannirselvam s/o Anthonisamy v Public Prosecutor

tags-parsed: Criminal Law/Offences/Public tranquillity/Rioting/Consideration of combination of direct and circumstantial evidence to establish accused sharing in common object of assembly/Section 146 Penal Code (Cap 224, 1985 Rev Ed)
